Sql.query: insert into sic.psu_rpfhid ( RPFHIDFECHA, RPFENETOTAL, RPFPOTMEDIA, ENEINDHIDRA, POTINDHIDRA,lastuser,lastdate ) values ( :RPFHIDFECHA, :RPFENETOTAL, :RPFPOTMEDIA, :ENEINDHIDRA, :POTINDHIDRA, :lastuser, :lastdate )
SELECT * FROM sic.psu_rpfhid WHERE rpfhidfecha > :rpfhidfechaIni AND rpfhidfecha < :rpfhidfechaFin ORDER BY to_char(rpfhidfecha,'MM/DD/YYYY') DESC

update sic.psu_rpfhid set rpfenetotal = :rpfenetotal, rpfpotmedia = :rpfpotmedia, eneindhidra = :eneindhidra, potindhidra = :potindhidra, lastuser = :lastuser, lastdate = :lastdate where rpfhidfecha = :rpfhidfecha
